description: Input schema for Seedream 3.0 T2I image generation.

prompt.description: Text prompt describing the image to generate. Be descriptive about style, composition, and details.
examples: A serene Japanese garden with cherry blossoms in full bloom, soft morning light, cinematic quality
prompt.title: Prompt

size.description: Output image resolution. Choose from various square and rectangular aspect ratios up to 2048x2048.

watermark.description: Whether to add a watermark to the generated image.
watermark.title: Watermark

title: AppInput
